name: Laurel County Correctional Center
description: The Laurel County Correctional Center is a modern, progressive facility located in London, Kentucky that houses approximately 550 County, State, and Federally incarcerated inmates. The facility operates under Jailer Jamie Mosley with a mission to set the standard as the model correctional agency in Kentucky, utilizing proactive programs and modern methods of custody, care and control.
source: Verified from official Laurel County Corrections website and Google search results
hours_of_operation: Monday-Friday 8:00 AM-10:00 PM (Administrative offices), 24/7 for calls
eligibility_requirements: Inmates placed in custody by the courts
populations_served: County, State, and Federal inmates and their families
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2025-01-22. CITATIONS: Contact information verified from official website https://laurelcountycorrections.org. Phone number (606) 878-9431 confirmed as current contact number. Address 440 Hammock Rd, London, KY 40744 verified from official website and Google Maps. Hours of operation verified from website: Administrative offices Monday-Friday 8:00 AM-10:00 PM, but facility accepts calls 24/7. Jailer Jamie Mosley has been in office since January 2011. Facility houses approximately 550 inmates. All information cross-referenced with Google search results and official website for accuracy.
